title: Hello Australia. Episodes 3 & 4.
creator_credit: SBS-TV, Eve Ash and Paul Drane
brief_description: Parts 3 and 4 of a series designed to give migrants more confidence in using English and to help them understand more about the Australian language and people. Short skits on subjects like going to a barbecue, ringing the emergency services, using the telephone are acted out to give a better understanding of Australian customs and the English language. Featuring George Donikian, Kay Stammers and Rod Quantok.
